ModMetaData.name: RimTalk_Github
ModMetaData.author: juicy
ModMetaData.description:
Bring your colonists to life with RimTalk! This revolutionary mod uses Google's AI to generate dynamic, context-aware dialogue for your pawns in real-time.
Key Features: • AI-powered conversations that reflect each pawn's current mood, thoughts, and situation • Context-aware dialogue based on what colonists are doing and thinking • Multi-language support for diverse colony experiences • Configurable conversation frequency and message suppression options • Easy setup - just get a free API key from Google AI Studio
Every conversation is unique and emergent, creating immersive storytelling experiences that evolve with your colony. Gone are the days of repetitive interactions - your pawns will now speak with personality and purpose!
Setup: Get your free API key at aistudio.google.com, enable the mod, and paste your key in mod settings. Compatible with most other mods and respects API rate limits automatically.
